title: Do you know any consciousness expanding information? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think that the word Consciousness is all about what we perceive, how we perceive it, and what perspectives are available to us at the time. Some people grant that there must be a single universal consciousness but that doesn’t seem to be the case as you cannot experience the same exact experience as say… a lady bug, or a tree. Our understanding only goes so far and therefore it’s an easy jump to make that we must have separate consciousnesses. Because we understand ourselves, and have the capability to do so. However, alternatively, most people have the power of sympathy or empathy, but truly these are extensions of how one imagines they would feel in the same circumstance. Thus we all have separate consciousnesses and therefore separate experiences. My reality cannot be your reality. But. our bodies are made of identical partials. So a connection does exist in the physical realm within all physical objects. Once you realize this, you can start to become more aware, and thus increasing your consciousness

There are those that recommend lysergic acid diethylamide…. I would maintain that any “expansion” of the consciousness is illusory. Psychedelics just make for different circuits to become active. Some folks recommend various meditation schemes… That there are effects seems undeniable, but as to whether these effects rise to the level of “expansion” remains to be seen.

Information can’t expand your consciousness, only experiences can. Psychedelics drugs can grant you access to different realms of reality, NDE can do the same. But you will not find consciousness expanding information anywhere. Information just doesn’t have that specific function.
